verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy, Holy, Holy, Holy
Lord of host you fill with glory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
all the earth and all the heavens
sing hossana, sing hossana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Blest and holy, Blest and holy,
he who comes now in the Lords name.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In the highest sing hossana.
In the highest sing hossana.
